examples.example: 我不知道去图书馆的路怎么走，所以我向路人询问。

translate.english: I don't know how to get to the library, so I ask passers-by.

examples.example: 当我们在陌生的地方迷路时，不要担心，礼貌地去问路人应该怎么走就行啦。

translate.english: When we get lost in a strange place, don't worry, just politely ask passers-by how to go.

examples.example: 我初到这座城市，碰到一位热心的老人家，便礼貌地询问他去景点的路怎么走。

translate.english: When I first arrived in this city, I met an enthusiastic old man, and then I politely asked him how to get to the scenic spots.
